name: id
description: The ID of the summary list.

name: rows
description: The rows within the summary list component.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the row `div`.

params.name: key
params.description: The reference content (key) for each row item in the summary list component.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each key. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each key. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the key wrapper.

params.name: value
params.description: The value for each row item in the summary list component.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each value. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each value. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the value wrapper.

params.name: actions
params.description: The action link content for each row item in the summary list component.

params.name: items
params.description: The action link items within the row item of the summary list component.

params.name: href
params.description: The value of the link's `href` attribute for an action item.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each action item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each action item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: visuallyHiddenText
params.description: Actions rely on context from the surrounding content so may require additional accessible text. Text supplied to this option is appended to the end. Use `html` for more complicated scenarios.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the actions wrapper.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the container.
